## PCMGpio type

PCM\_DOUT, which can be set to use GPIOs 21 and 31. Only 21 is available on the B+/2B/PiZero/3B, on pin 40. See [https://github.com/jgarff/rpi\_ws281x?tab=readme-ov-file\#pcm](https://github.com/jgarff/rpi_ws281x?tab=readme-ov-file#pcm)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PCMGpio = 21 | 31;
```
